binding.label: Parameter Selection Mode: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['TEST', 'POSITION X/Y/Z', 'ATTITUDE P/Y/R', 'JOINT ANGLE', 'VEL X/Y/Z', 'RATE P/Y/R', 'PORT TEMP', 'STBD TEMP']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Joint Selection Mode: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['SHOULDER YAW', 'SHOULDER PITCH', 'ELBOW', 'WRIST PITCH', 'WRIST YAW', 'WRIST ROLL', 'END EFF TEMP', 'CRIT TEMP']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Drive Selection: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['TEST', 'OPR CMD', 'AUTO 1', 'AUTO 2', 'AUTO 3', 'AUTO 4', 'ORB UNL', 'END EFF', 'ORB LD', 'PL', 'SINGLE', 'DIRECT']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: SBand: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['GPC', 'LL FWD', 'LL AFT', 'UL FWD', 'UL AFT', 'UR FWD', 'UR AFT', 'LR FWD', 'LR AFT', 'Pause']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: HSI Mode Select: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['TAEM (not activated)', 'ENTRY (not activated)', 'APPROACH (not activated)']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: HSI Mode Select: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['TAEM (not activated)', 'ENTRY (not activated)', 'APPROACH (not activated)']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Radiator Controller Loop 1: %s
binding.script: var modes = OFF', 'AUTO A', 'AUTO B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Radiator Controller Loop 2: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'AUTO A', 'AUTO B']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Top Evap Heat Nozzle Left: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'B AUTO', 'A AUTO']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Top Evap Heat Nozzle Right: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'C AUTO', 'B AUTO']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Entry Mode: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Auto', 'Lo Gain', 'No Y Jet']; return modes[arg[0]];

PropertyList.animation:
knob n2-reg-inlet-sys2-valve /fdm/jsbsim/systems/eclss/nitrogen/sys2-n2-reg-inlet-valve-status -45L2 45
-11.7714 -1.0479 -0.9232
0 1 -.4
property-adjust /fdm/jsbsim/systems/eclss/nitrogen/sys2-n2-reg-inlet-valve-status 1 0 1 false
nasal SpaceShuttle.click("avionics")
set-tooltip n2-reg-inlet-sys2-valve N2 Reg Inlet Sys2 Valve: %s /fdm/jsbsim/systems/eclss/nitrogen/sys2-n2-reg-inlet-valve-status nasal
var modes = ['Closed', 'Open']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Flash Evaporator Feedline Heater A: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', '1 Supply', '2 Supply']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Flash Evaporator Feedline Heater B: %s
binding.script: var modes = ['Off', '1 Supply', '2 Supply']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: MPS Manifold Press Valve Cntrl LH2: %s
MPS Manifold Press Valve Cntrl LO2: %s
